MapEditor.Util

类 StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • MapEditor.Util.StringUtil

  • public class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is used for functions to comparison and determination of all String types contents in the .map file.

      • fromRectangle

        public static java.lang.String fromRectangle(java.awt.Rectangle rec)
        input a rectangle and return the rectangle's Attributes.
        参数:
        rec -
        返回:
        rectangle's coordinate and width and height

      • equal

        public static boolean equal(java.lang.String a,
                            java.lang.String b)
        this method is using to check two files names and contents are the same or not author name if null or not.
        参数:
        a - one file name or content name
        b - another file name or content na
        返回:
        true these names are same, otherwise false.

      • equal

        public static boolean equal(java.lang.String a,
                            java.lang.String b,
                            boolean equateNullAndEmptyString)
        this method is using to check two files names and contents are the same or not author name if null or not.
        参数:
        a - name of string type
        b - name of string type
        equateNullAndEmptyString -
        返回:
        true if two names are the same, otherwise false

      • isBlank

        public static boolean isBlank(java.lang.String s)
        method to check a string is null or length is 0.
        参数:
        s - one string
        返回:
        true if teh string is null or length is 0, otherwise false.

      • parseInt

        public static int parseInt(java.lang.String str,
                           int def)
        method to reading contents in the .map file
        参数:
        str - contents in the specific line
        def - line number
        返回:
        return the specific line number.
